title: Synthesis, structural, spectroscopic and electric/dielectric studies of a nanocrystalline Ni(II) complex based on [(1,3-diphenyl-1H-pyrazol-4-yl)methylene]thiocarbonohydrazide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9747-9757
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00665H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
R. Fouad, Tarik E. Ali, Mohammed A. Assiri, S. S. Shenouda
A Ni2+ nanocomplex based on a heterocyclic ligand containing a pyrazole moiety was developed in this work, and its electric conductivity and dielectric characteristics were studied.
